attributes.action: Mental Health Crisis in South Kensington & surrounding boroughs
attributes.additional_details: The government has a duty to help the people of this country. I believe that this will help the public heal. Please sign this petition! :)
attributes.background:
Launch initatives to tell people to stay at home & build trust with friends/family. 

Launch community projects in primary schools

Help people get involved in local charity work- helping homeless / vunerable 

‘Trust initatives’ - give a friend a hug! Make a meal together!

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local initiatives along the lines you've suggested are a matter for individual local authorities and charities, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
